problem.p: True or False: When you perform a restore operation to a point in time or from a DB Snapshot, a new DB Instance is created with a new endpoint.
In the Launch Db Instance Wizard, where can I select the backup and maintenance options?
What does the following command do with respect to the Amazon EC2 security groups? ec2-create-group CreateSecurityGroup

choicegroup.choice: Groups the user created security groups in to a new group for easy access.
Creates a new security group for use with your account.
Creates a new group inside the security group.
Creates a new rule inside the security group.

problem.p: A/An _____ acts as a firewall that controls the traffic allowed to reach one or more instances.

IAM provides several policy templates you can use to automatically assign permissions to the groups you create. The _____ policy template gives the Admins group permission to access all account resources, except your AWS account information

choicegroup.choice: AWS Cloud Formation Read Only Access

problem.p: IAM’s Policy Evaluation Logic always starts with a default ____________ for every request, except for those that use the AWS account’s root security credentials b
Provisioned IOPS Costs: you are charged for the IOPS and storage whether or not you use them in a given month.
While performing the volume status checks, if the status is insufficient-data, what does it mean?

choicegroup.choice: the checks may still be in progress on the volume

problem.p: By default, when an EBS volume is attached to a Windows instance, it may show up as any drive letter on the instance. You can change the settings of the _____ Service to set the drive letters of the EBS volumes per your specifications.
For each DB Instance class, what is the maximum size of associated storage capacity?
SQL Server __________ store logins and passwords in the master database.

choicegroup.choice: can be configured to but by default does not

problem.p: To view information about an Amazon EBS volume, open the Amazon EC2 console at https://console.aws.amazon.com/ec2/, click __________ in the Navigation pane.
Does Amazon RDS allow direct host access via Telnet, Secure Shell (SSH), or Windows Remote Desktop Connection?

choicegroup.choice: Depends on if it is in VPC or not

problem.p: You must increase storage size in increments of at least __________ %
Using Amazon IAM, can I give permission based on organizational groups?

choicegroup.choice: Yes but only in certain cases

problem.p: What is Oracle SQL Developer?

choicegroup.choice: An AWS developer who is an expert in Amazon RDS using both the Oracle and SQL Server DB engines
A graphical Java tool distributed without cost by Oracle.
It is a variant of the SQL Server Management Studio designed by Microsoft to support Oracle DBMS functionalities
A different DBMS released by Microsoft free of cost

problem.p: What is an isolated database environment running in the cloud (Amazon RDS) called?
While creating the snapshots using the API, which Action should I be using?
Read Replicas require a transactional storage engine and are only supported for the _________ storage engine
Will my standby RDS instance be in the same Availability Zone as my primary?
How many types of block devices does Amazon EC2 support A
What happens to the data on an instance if the instance reboots (intentionally or unintentionally)?

choicegroup.choice: Data may persist however cannot be sure

problem.p: When running my DB Instance as a Multi-AZ deployment, can I use the standby for read or write operations?
While launching an RDS DB instance, on which page I can select the Availability Zone?
While signing in REST/ Query requests, for additional security, you should transmit your requests using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) by using _________
In the ‘Detailed’ monitoring data available for your Amazon EBS volumes, Provisioned IOPS volumes automatically send _____ minute metrics to Amazon CloudWatch.
Are Reserved Instances available for Multi-AZ Deployments?
When should I choose Provisioned IOPS over Standard RDS storage?

choicegroup.choice: If you use production online transaction processing (OLTP) workloads.
If you have workloads that are not sensitive to consistent performance

problem.p: What is the minimum charge for the data transferred between Amazon RDS and Amazon EC2 Instances in the same Availability Zone?
What happens to the I/O operations while you take a database snapshot?

choicegroup.choice: I/O operations to the database are suspended for a few minutes while the backup is in progress.
I/O operations to the database are sent to a Replica (if available) for a few minutes while the backup is in progress.
I/O operations will be functioning normally
I/O operations to the database are suspended for an hour while the backup is in progress
